item.title: Web Application Security
item.description: Rise of the Web App Over the past few years we have seen tremendous growth in the rise of browser-based applications. Native applications are still popular however the trend is moving towards web apps that run directly from the browser. Web applications are convenient by the fact that all data can be synced between devices and stored in the cloud. Gone are the days of configuring, updating and syncing the data on native apps.
